Sentencas: Solid oxide fuel cell (SOFC) is a promising technology for decentralized power generation and cogeneration.
Titulo: Solid oxide fuel cell systems for distributed power generation and cogeneration

Sentencas: This technology has several advantages: the high electric efficiency, which can be theoretically improved through integration in power cycles; the low emissions; and the possibility of using a large variety of gaseous fuels.
Titulo: Solid oxide fuel cell systems for distributed power generation and cogeneration

Sentencas: The analysis of some possible improvements of a 100 kW SOFC system as well as possible applications is conducted.
Titulo: Solid oxide fuel cell systems for distributed power generation and cogeneration

Sentencas: Both technical and economic aspects are considered.
Titulo: Solid oxide fuel cell systems for distributed power generation and cogeneration
